CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 20, 1957, page A10, reads: "A Happy Occasion - Relatives and friends gathered at the home of Mr. and Mrs. Lawrence Chapman, 43 Strauss St., last Friday, to honor Mr. Chatman on the occasion of his birthday. Many beautiful gifts were received. Sharing honors with Mr. Chatman at the festive affair were Mr. and Mrs. Sidney Humphrey who were married July 4. Mr. and Mrs. Chatman are seated fourth and fifth, respectively, in first row. The honoree is a long time resident of the North Side, and is employed by the Pittsburgh Plate Glass Company. Mrs. Chatman is a well known nurse. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of seven men and nine women, including Mr. and Mrs. Sidney Humphrey and Mr and Mrs. Chatman, seated front row, fourth and fifth from left, gathered behind a table with light colored tablecloth, cake, flowers, and candles, for Mr. Chatman's birthday in interior of house on Strauss Street with circular patterned wallpaper, North Side, another version
